description: Try our easy to follow Date, Pepitas & Yoghurt Protein Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,High fibre,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Date, Pepitas & Yoghurt Protein Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place dates in the bowl of a food processor and pulse until chopped. If it forms a ball, break into pieces.

Add 1/3 cup yoghurt and all remaining ingredients except coconut. Process until well combined. Transfer mixture to a bowl. Roll tablespoons of the mixture into balls. Place on a tray lined with baking paper.

Place 1/2 cup yoghurt and coconut in 2 small bowls. Dip half of each ball into coconut, then half in yoghurt. Return to tray. Chill for 1 hour to firm. Serve with yoghurt for dipping. Store in an airtight container in fridge for up to 1 week.
